src:
Ronald Koeman Terdepan Gantikan Ernesto Valverde di Barcelona
05 Nov 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub La Liga, Barcelona diberitakan mulai melakukan seleksi untuk calon manajer baru mereka. Skuat El Blaugrana diberitakan memprioritaskan untuk merekrut Ronald Koeman sebagai pelatih baru mereka.
Sejak tahun 2017 silam, Barcelona ditangani oleh sosok Ernesto Valverde. Mantan pelatih Athletic Bilbao itu menggantikan sosok Luis Enrique yang mengundurkan diri sebagai manajer Barcelona.
Selama di Catalunya, Valverde sebenarnya cukup sukses. Ia memenangkan dua trofi La Liga beruntun sepanjang menangani Los Cules.
Namun Mundo Deportivo mengklaim bahwa Barcelona tidak tertarik untuk melanjutkan kerjasama dengan Valverde. Mereka berencana menunjuk manajer baru bagi tim mereka di musim depan.

Apa alasan Barca memutuskan kerjasama dengan Valverde? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Ronald Koeman is leading the way Replace Ernesto Valverde in Barcelona
05 Nov 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - La Liga club, Barcelona reportedly began selection for their new managerial candidate. El Blaugrana's squad is reported to have prioritized recruiting Ronald Koeman as their new coach.
Since 2017, Barcelona has been handled by Ernesto Valverde. The former Athletic Bilbao coach replaces the figure of Luis Enrique who resigned as Barcelona manager.
While in Catalunya, Valverde was actually quite successful. He won two La Liga titles in a row while dealing with Los Cules.
But Mundo Deportivo claims that Barcelona is not interested in continuing cooperation with Valverde. They plan to appoint a new manager for their team next season.

What is the reason for Barca deciding to cooperate with Valverde? Check out the information below.
